text: Oni okhotno vyslushivayut lozh' i pozhirayut zapretnoye. Yesli oni yavyatsya k tebe, to rassudi ikh ili zhe otvernis' ot nikh. Yesli ty otvernesh'sya ot nikh, to oni niskol'ko ne navredyat tebe. No yesli ty vynesesh' resheniye, to sudi ikh bespristrastno. Voistinu, Allakh lyubit bespristrastnykh
